titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the 19th century handwritten recipe book, circa 1880 2021ms006
titlestmt.author: Bri Grimsley

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-06-08 13:42:50 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

repository.corpname: University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: The 19th century handwritten recipe book (circa 1880; 0.1 cubic feet; 1 folder) comprises one small 54 page notebook that contains personal recipes and homekeeping notes from an unknown Kentucky household.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: Although the author and date of the book are unknown, the author is a Kentucky woman with an interest in cooking and homekeeping from the latter part of the 19th century.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 2021ms006; [identification of item], 19th century handwritten recipen book, circa 1880, University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The 19th century handwritten recipe book (circa 1880; 0.1 cubic feet; 1 folder) comprises one small 54 page notebook that contains personal recipes and homekeeping notes from an unknown Kentucky household. The book contains recipes for meat, soups, pickles, cakes, and puddings. There is also a recipe and instructions for disinfectant.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The physical rights to the materials in this collection are held by the University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center.
